mapper.insert: INSERT INTO placeList( placeid, placename, placeregdate, placecheck, placejuso, uuid, placecategory, bookmark, bloglink, iconname) VALUES( placeid, #{placename}, now(), 0, #{placejuso}, #{uuid}, #{placecategory}, 0, #{bloglink}, #{iconname} );
mapper.select: SELECT placeid, placename, placecategory, iconname, placejuso, placeregdate, bookmark, placecheck, bloglink FROM placeList WHERE uuid =#{uuid} ORDER BY bookmark DESC;
SELECT * FROM placeList WHERE placecheck=#{placecheck} and uuid =#{uuid};
SELECT count(placeid) FROM placeList WHERE placecategory = #{placecategory} and placecheck =#{placecheck} and uuid=#{uuid};
SELECT count(placeid) FROM placeList WHERE placecategory = #{placecategory} and uuid = #{uuid};
SELECT count(placeid) FROM placeList WHERE uuid = #{uuid} and (DATE(placeregdate) BETWEEN #{firstdate} and #{enddate});
SELECT count(*) FROM placeList WHERE placejuso LIKE #{areaname} and uuid =#{uuid};
SELECT * FROM follow WHERE uuid=#{uuid} and status ='N';
SELECT * FROM follow WHERE follow_uuid=#{uuid} and status ='N';
SELECT * FROM follow WHERE (uuid=#{uuid} OR follow_uuid=#{uuid}) AND status ='Y';
SELECT membernick FROM member WHERE uuid=#{uuid};
SELECT b.membernick ,mp.p_name FROM member b ,member_profile mp WHERE b.uuid = mp.uuid and b.uuid=#{uuid};
SELECT follow_uuid FROM follow WHERE uuid=#{uuid} and status='N';
SELECT uuid FROM follow WHERE follow_uuid=3 and status ='N';
SELECT follow_uuid FROM follow WHERE uuid=#{uuid} and status='Y';
SELECT uuid FROM follow WHERE follow_uuid=3 and status ='Y';
SELECT ts_id FROM bookmark WHERE uuid=#{uuid};
SELECT * FROM travel_story WHERE uuid=#{uuid} ORDER by tslike DESC ;
